title: Inclusive Research Project Collaboration Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of research methodologies and prior exposure to scientific inquiry processes
context.additional_context: Real-time online workshops emphasizing the creation of a safe, respectful collaborative environment accessible to all participants regardless of disability status.

learning_goals: Participants can write project proposals by applying a six-step inclusive research collaboration process.
Learners can suggest three or more practical strategies for effective communication with team members from diverse backgrounds.
Participants can analyze conflict cases that may arise in inclusive research environments and derive resolution strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
